entry.def: The remaining things or people out of a group are the things or people that still exist, are still present, or have not yet been dealt with.

example.ex: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences...
example.tran: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

example.ex: The United States has withdrawn the remaining staff from its embassy...
example.tran: 美国已经撤回了大使馆的剩余人员。

Sentence.sentence: In many cases, screening can lead to surgeries to remove cancer, while the cancers themselves may be slow-growing and may not pose serious health problems in patients' remaining years.
But for the remainder, the risk of cancer, while increased at the end of life, must be balanced with other factors like remaining life expectancy（预期寿命）

Some restaurants are modifying the recipes (菜谱) of British dishes to breathe new life into the classics, while others are using better quality ingredients but remaining true to British traditions and tastes.

sentences.en: Add all the remaining ingredients and bring to the boil.
sentences.cn: 加入所有剩下的用料，煮到沸腾。

sentences.en: Add the remaining flour to make a soft dough.
sentences.cn: 把剩下的面粉加进去做成一块软面团。
